name: Shooter Jam
description:
Controls:

Player 1:

- Up: W

- Down: S

- Right: D

- Left: A

- Activation: F

- Reload: R

- Next item: E

- Previous item: Q

- Shot: Space

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Player 2:

- Up: U

- Down: J

- Right: L

- Left: H

- Activation: 0

- Reload: O

- Next item: I

- Previous item: Y

- Shot: P

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Player 3:

- Up: Up Arrow

- Down: Down Arrow

- Right: Right Arrow

- Left: Left Arrow

- Activation: Delete

- Reload: End

- Next item: Right Shift

- Previous item: Right Control

- Shot: Return

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Player 4:

- Up: Numpad 8

- Down: Numpad 5

- Right: Numpad 6

- Left: Numpad 4

- Activation: Numpad 3

- Reload: Numpad 2

- Next item: Numpad 9

- Previous item: Numpad 7

- Shot: Numpad 0
